entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10 except minus 15 in low lying areas.
